ColumnSpecification.Data:
if (alignment.type ~= "mainTrack" or alignment.mainDir == "down") and (dir == "up" or dir == "both") then pri = 2000 elseif (alignment.type ~= "mainTrack" or alignment.mainDir == "down") and (dir == "down" or dir == "both") then pri = 3000 elseif (alignment.type == "mainTrack" and alignment.mainDir == "up") and (dir == "up" or dir == "both") then pri = 0 elseif (alignment.type == "mainTrack" and alignment.mainDir == "up") and (dir == "down") then pri = 1000 else pri = -1,_warning end
local function is(pattern) if variant == nil then return false else return string.match(Variant,pattern) end end
--Signal prioritering if is("60") then delta = 0 elseif is("62") then delta = 1 elseif is("101") then delta = 2 elseif is("refleks") then delta = 3 elseif is("102") then delta = 4 elseif is("68C") then delta = 5 elseif is("72") then delta = 6
--Hastighetsskilt elseif is("68A") or is("68B") then delta = 7 elseif is("68F") then delta = 8 elseif is("68G") then delta = 9 elseif is("68D") then delta = 10 elseif is("69") then delta = 11
--Toglengdeskilt elseif is("74") then delta = this.trainLength else delta = 40 end
return pri + delta
ColumnSpecification.Title: Pri

ColumnSpecification.Data:
local a = Relations["Har balisegruppe"] if a.Count == 0 then return " " else if a[0].Variant == "Repeterbalisegruppe" then target=a[0].Relations["Henter ATC styringsinformasjon fra signal/markerboard/skilt/stolpe/sporveksel"][0]
elseif a[0].Variant == "Hastighetsbalisegruppe" then target=a[0].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"][0].Relations["Har posisjonsdefinerende balise"][0] else target = a[0].Relations["Har posisjonsdefinerende balise"][0] end dif=target.ReferenceMileage-a[0].Relations["Har posisjonsdefinerende balise"][0].ReferenceMileage d = math.floor(dif + 0.5) if d == 0 then return " " else return math.abs(d) end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Avstand merke [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data:
local a,d
if (Relations["Har balisegruppe"].Count == 0) then return " " else a = Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"] --Assume that start item has only one target item --First, find distance d = math.abs(a:distance()) if (d == 0) then return " " end --Second, find difference in elevation above sea level: t1 = getAlignmentInfo(this) t2 = getAlignmentInfo(a[0]) local e1 = t1.elevation local e2 = t2.elevation local g1 = t1.gradient local g2 = t2.gradient
if (tostring(dir) == "down") then g1 = -g1 g2 = -g2 elseif (tostring(dir) ~= "up") then return "*ERROR - bad direction*" end
local g3 = (e2 - e1) / d * 1000
-- Reduce info if gradients at each end are nearly identical to the average gradient: if (math.abs(g2-g1) < .01) and (math.abs(g3-g1) < .01) then if(g3 < 0) then return string.format("%.01f",-g3) end else if (g1 < 0) then return string.format("%.1f",-g1) end end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: I kjøre- retn. [o/oo]
I km-retn.
Mot km-retn.
I km-retn.
Mot km-retn.

ColumnSpecification.Data:
local s0 = "" local s1 = "" local s5 = "" if Variant then s0 = Variant else s0 = "" end if (attachment == nil) then s1 = "" s5 = "" else if getCollectionLength(Relations["Har balisegruppe"]) == 0 then
--TODO: Bruk heller getCollectionLength(Relations[Er stolpe for tellepunkt"] > 0 etc if Variant:match("64E") and Relations["Er stolpe for tellepunkt"] and Relations["Er stolpe for tellepunkt"][0] then s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..Relations["Er stolpe for tellepunkt"][0].RcType
elseif Variant:match("68") or Variant:match("64E") or Variant:match("Signal 60") then obj = getNearbyPointObjects2D(15) s1 = " " for i = 0,obj.count-1 do if obj[i].Variant:match("balisegruppe") or obj[i].RcType:match("sporingsindikator") then if obj[i].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"] then if obj[i].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"].Count ~= 0 then s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..obj[i].name.." med målpunkt i balisegruppe "..obj[i].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"][0].name break else s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..obj[i].name break end end elseif obj[i].RcType:match("Telle") and Variant:match("64E") then s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..obj[i].RcType break end end else s1 = " " end
if Variant:match("kryss") then obj = getNearbyPointObjects2D(10) s1 = " " for i = 0,obj.count-1 do if obj[i].RcType:match("veksel") then s1="
Tilhører 		".."V."..tostring(obj[i].code) break elseif obj[i].RcType:match("Drivmaskin") then Cd = tostring(obj[i].name) place = string.find(Cd,"%.") s1 = "
Tilhører 		".."V."..string.sub(Cd,1,place-1) break end end end
else if Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"] then if Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"].Count ~= 0 then s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].name.." med målpunkt i balisegruppe "..Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].Relations["Har bremsekurve målpunkt i balisegruppe"][0].name end else s1 = "
Tilhører 		"..Relations["Har balisegruppe"][0].name end end
if (Attachment.Variant == nil) then s5 = "" elseif Attachment.RcType:match("SPB") then s5 = "
Montert på 		"..this.Attachment.Variant elseif Attachment.RcType:match("SA%-SIG") then s5="
Montert på 		"..tostring(Attachment.name) else obj= getNearbyPointObjects2D(10) for i=0,obj.count-1 do if obj[i].RcType:match("SA%-SIG") and not this.RcType:match("Signal 68") then s5="
Montert på 		"..tostring(obj[i].name) break elseif obj[i].RcType:match("SPB") then s5="
Montert på 		"..tostring(obj[i].Variant) break else s5 = "
Montert på 		"..this.Attachment.Variant end end
end end return s0..s1..s5
ColumnSpecification.Title: Anmerkning

ColumnSpecification.Data: d = math.abs(DistanceToAlignment) if d < 1.8 then return "Bad dist: "..d --less than this and the poor sign/board will be hit by a train elseif RightSided then return "Høyre" else return "Venstre" end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Side av spor

ColumnSpecification.Data:
local function is(pattern) if variant == nil then return false else return string.match(Variant,pattern) end end
if is("68") or is("69") or is("74") then return "SO" elseif is("64A") then return "SE" elseif is("64B") or is("65") then return "E" elseif is("63") or is("75") then return "O" elseif is("kjedebrudd") then return "SO" elseif is("bevegelig kryss") then return "SO" else return "S" end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Fag

ColumnSpecification.Data: if Tag == "" then return "-" else return Tag end
ColumnSpecification.Title: BaneData ID

Header.Name: Direction of increasing mileage (assuming fairly horizontal tracks in current UCS)

ColumnSpecification.Data: -- Compare the X-coordinates (0 decimal degrees = East) for start and end of alignment in current User Coordinate System: o = DocumentData.Document.Database.Ucsorg u = DocumentData.Document.Database.Ucsxdir ang = math.atan(u.y,u.x) p = RcAlignment.StartPoint u1x = (p.x-o.x)*math.cos(ang) + (p.y-o.y)*math.sin(ang) --u1y = -(p.x-o.x)*math.sin(ang) + (p.y-o.y)*math.cos(ang) p = RcAlignment.EndPoint u2x = (p.x-o.x)*math.cos(ang) + (p.y-o.y)*math.sin(ang) --u2y = -(p.x-o.x)*math.sin(ang) + (p.y-o.y)*math.cos(ang) return string.format("%s",u2x-u1x > 0 and "Right" or "Left")
x = RcAlignment.StartTangent.x y = RcAlignment.StartTangent.y z = RcAlignment.StartTangent.z g = 1000 * math.sqrt(z^2 / (x^2 + y^2)) return string.format("%.03f",g)
x = RcAlignment.EndTangent.x y = RcAlignment.EndTangent.y z = RcAlignment.EndTangent.z g = 1000 * math.sqrt(z^2 / (x^2 + y^2)) return string.format("%.03f",g)

TableSpecification.Title: Track connectivity
TableSpecification.LuaFilter: RcType == "KO-SPF Sporfortsettelse" or RcType == "KO-SPV Sporkryss" or RcType == "KO-SPV Sporveksel"

ColumnSpecification.Data: msg = mc_Continuity return msg:lower():match("ok") and "OK" or msg
msg = mc_Elevation return msg:lower():match("ok") and "OK" or msg
msg = mc_Tangent return msg:lower():match("ok") and "OK" or msg

if RcType:lower():match("sporveksel$") or RcType:lower():match("sporfortsettelse$") then msg = mc_Gradient elseif RcType:lower():match("sporkryss$") then msg = mc_GradientAndCant else msg = "(Model check not found)" end return msg:lower():match("ok") and "OK" or msg

if RcType:lower():match("sporveksel$") or RcType:lower():match("sporfortsettelse$") then msg = mc_Cant elseif RcType:lower():match("sporkryss$") then msg = mc_GradientAndCant else msg = "(Model check not found)" end return msg:lower():match("ok") and "OK" or msg
if (Dir == "up") then return "Stigende Km" else return "Synkende Km" end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Retning

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (SwitchGeometry == "left") then return "V" elseif (SwitchGeometry == "right") then return "H" else return "???",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Avvik

ColumnSpecification.Data: local r = Relations["Er koblet med sporveksel"] if getCollectionLength(r) == 0 then return "-" else return r[0].code end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Koblet med

ColumnSpecification.Data: str = "Horisontaltrasé, " .. Name if ocpRef then str = str .. ", " .. getObjectFromId(ocpRef).name end return str
ColumnSpecification.Title: Beskrivelse
Kurveradius(m)
Overgangskurvens lengde

ColumnSpecification.Data: str = "Vertikaltrase, " .. Name if ocpRef then str = str .. ", " .. getObjectFromId(ocpRef).name end return str
ColumnSpecification.Title: Beskrivelse

TableSpecification.Title: Mastetabell for kontaktledningsanlegg
TableSpecification.LuaFilter: RcType:sub(1,6) == "EH-MAS" or RcType == "EH-KLO Tunnelfeste" or (RcType == "EH-AEH Avspenning" and Variant == "Fixpunkt")

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (string.find(Variant:lower(),"hengemast")) then if (string.find(OcsMastProfile,"Ø120")) then s = "HGM Ø120" elseif (string.find(OcsMastProfile,"100x100")) then s = "HGM" elseif (string.find(OcsMastProfile,"100x150")) then s = "HGM" elseif (string.find(OcsMastProfile,"100x200")) then s = "HGM" else s = "Ukjent Masteprofil ["..OcsMastProfile.."]",_warning end return s else return OcsMastProfile end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Mastetype

ColumnSpecification.Data:
-- "Mastens stilling" betyr egentlig "mastesymbol med utligger". -- -- Nedenfor vil "*" bety enten O = gittermast, X = hengemast, 8 = bjelkemast G = GMB-mast -- -- *- Enkel utligger til høyre side i økende km-retning -- -* Enkel utligger til venstre side i økende km-retning -- *= Dobbel utligger til høyre side i økende km-retning -- =* Dobbel utligger til venstre side i økende km-retning -- -- Kombinasjoner er tillatt - enkel/dobbel til begge sider. --
local symbol = "*" if Variant:lower():match("henge") then symbol = "X" elseif Variant:lower():match("gmb") then -- 2019-05-05 CLFEY foreslår 'G' for GMB-master. symbol = "G" elseif Variant:lower():match("b%-mast") or Variant:lower():match("h%-mast") then symbol = "O" elseif Variant:lower():match("bjelke") then symbol = "8" else return "Ukjent Variant ["..Variant.."].",_warning
if (getCollectionLength(Relations["Er kl-mast for utligger"]) == 0) then return "Har ikke utligger",_warning elseif (getCollectionLength(Relations["Er kl-mast for utligger"]) == 1) then if (this.DistanceToAlignment - Relations["Er kl-mast for utligger"][0].DistanceToAlignment > 0) then return "-"..symbol else return symbol.."-" end else --getCollectionLength(Relations["Er kl-mast for utligger"]) > 1 return "Har ikke laget formel for multiple utliggere",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Retning

ColumnSpecification.Data: r = getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius if r == "Infinity" then return "RL" else if math.abs(r) > 5e5 then return "RL" else if getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CCW" then return string.format("%0d",r) else return string.format("%0d",-r) end end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Kurve-\Pradius

ColumnSpecification.Data: local c = getAlignmentInfo().Cant if (RC__isNan(c)) then return "-" else return string.format("%.0f",c) end
ColumnSpecification.Title: OH

TableSpecification.Title: Jordingstabell [angi tegningsnummer her]
TableSpecification.LuaFilter: --CLFEY 2020-03-01 EARTHING TABLE - Based on the 'Lieråsen-Brakerøya' project for Bane NOR. --Make one copy of this table for each layout. Edit Lua changes in master table. --Associate each table with the area capturing the objects to be included in the table. -- --This table definition relies on the following Lua functions to be contained in the DNA: -- RC__identify(xyzzy) : Returns object xyzzy's name if present, or code if present, or guid. -- RC__toKm(ReferenceMileage) : Returns a string with ref. mileage as km with 3 decimals (meter precision). -- r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) : Returns Relations[s]:filter(function (x) return x:isVisible() end) and the size of that collection. -- RcType == "EH-JOR Jordleder" or ( EarthingMethod == "Wire" or (EarthingMethod == "Rail" or EarthingMethod == "Track") or --(prepared for future change to enum value from 'Rail' to 'Track') EarthingMethod == "Object" --Ignore those with 'None' and 'Unknown'. ) and ( --Replace with your project's min/max mileages for this table, if mileage limits are required. ReferenceMileage >= 0 and ReferenceMileage <= math.huge )

ColumnSpecification.Data: if RcAlignment == nil then -- Point object: return RC__toKm(ReferenceMileage) else return "-" end

if RcType == "EH-JOR Jordleder" then return code
elseif EarthingMethod == "Wire" then if EarthingAlignment == nil then return "Missing PE wire" else return RC__identify(EarthingAlignment) end
elseif EarthingMethod == "Rail" or EarthingMethod == "Track" then --(prepared for future change to enum value from 'Rail' to 'Track') if EarthingAlignment == nil then return "Missing track" else return EarthingAlignment.code end
elseif EarthingMethod == "Object" then if EarthingObject == nil then return "Missing PE object" else return RC__identify(EarthingObject) end
elseif EarthingMethod == "None" or EarthingMethod == "Unknown" then --(Should have been filtered out already) return "PE not required"
else return "*** Bad EarthingMethod ["..tostring(EarthingMethod).."]." end

--Earth wires are alignments, so assume that they have each been related to a marker placed on the wire, to extract side-of-track etc. if RcAlignment == nil then obj = this --Point object else s = "Har markør" r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then return "-" else obj = r[0] end end return obj.Leftsided and "Venstre" or "Høyre"

--There may be a need to show the earthing of object types for which RC does not have a specific model yet. --These objects are to be represented by RcType 'Watch' objects and will present them selves as 'Diverse'. t = RcType:sub(8) if t == "Watch" then return "Diverse" else return t.." / "..(Variant == nil and "" or Variant) end
if RcType == "EH-JOR Jordleder" then return "Skinne / "..RC__identify() else return EarthingLabelText end

--Translate from English if needed: if EarthingLabelColor == "Red" then return "Rød" elseif EarthingLabelColor == "Green" then return "Grønn" elseif EarthingLabelColor == "White" then return "Hvit" elseif EarthingLabelColor== "Blue" then return "Blå" elseif EarthingLabelColor == "Yellow" then return "Gul" elseif RcType == "EH-JOR Jordleder" then return "Rød" else return EarthingLabelColor end
if EarthingMethod == "Rail" and LeftSided then return "X" end
if EarthingMethod == "Rail" and RightSided then return "X" end

if RcType == "EH-JOR Jordleder" then return "Direkte til skinne"
elseif EarthingMethod == "Rail" then return "Direkte til skinne"
elseif EarthingMethod == "Wire" then return "Direkte til langsgående jordleder"
elseif EarthingMethod == "Object" then return "Jordet via "..RC__identify(EarthingObject)
else return "?" end
s = "Er åk-mast for åk" r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n > 0 then return "Tilhører åk "..r[0].code else return "" end

Variant.Name: Forriglingstabell 4 Sidedekning for togvei og skiftevei

ColumnSpecification.Data: if name:match("Rep") then return "Rep.Hs" elseif (MainSignal ~= "-") then return "Hovedsignal" elseif (DistantSignal ~= "-") then return "Forsignal" elseif (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then return "Dvergsignal" else return "Ukjent signaltype",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Signaltype

ColumnSpecification.Data: if dir == "down" then return "Synkende km" elseif dir == "up" then return "Stigende km" else return "Ukjent retning ["..dir.."]",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Retning

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (Sight == 0) then return "(ikke angitt)" else return Sight end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Siktkrav [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data: local dirIsUp = (dir == "up") local dirIsDown = (dir == "down") -- if (dirIsUp and RightSided) then return "Høyre" elseif (dirIsUp and LeftSided) then return "Venstre" elseif (dirIsDown and RightSided) then return "Venstre" elseif (dirIsDown and LeftSided) then return "Høyre" else return "Feil: Ukjent dir ["..dir.."]" end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Side av spor i kjøre- retningen

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "-" else return math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius+0.5) end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Kurveradius [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "Rettspor" elseif (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CCW") then return "Venstrekurve" elseif (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CW") then return "Høyrekurve" else return "Feil i kurverotasjon [" .. tostring(getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation) .. "]",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Høyre / venstre kurve (Oslo i ryggen)

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "Rettspor" else if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CCW") then if (LeftSided) then return "Innerkurve" else return "Ytterkurve" end else if (RightSided) then return "Innerkurve" else return "Ytterkurve" end end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Innerkurve / ytterkurve

ColumnSpecification.Data: local s = "" local first = true if (MainSignal ~= "-") then s = MainSignal first = false end if (DistantSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Fs" else s = s.."-Fs" end first = false end if (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Ds" else s = s.."-Ds" end first = false end if (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Z" else s = s.."-Z" end first = false end if (PositionLamp ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "MKs" else s = s.."-MKs" end first = false end if (CautiousDrivingSignal == "Ja") then if (first) then s = "FKs" else s = s.."-FKs" end first = false end if (LineSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Ls" else s = s.."-Ls" end first = false end if (OpticalSpeedSignal == "Ja") then if (first) then s = "Hast" else s = s.."-Hast" end first = false end return s
ColumnSpecification.Title: Bestykning

ColumnSpecification.Data: if name:lower():match("rep") then return "Rep.Hs" elseif (MainSignal ~= "-") then return "Hovedsignal" elseif (DistantSignal ~= "-") then return "Forsignal" elseif (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then return "Dvergsignal" else return "Ukjent signaltype",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Signaltype

ColumnSpecification.Data: if dir == "down" then return "Synkende km" elseif dir == "up" then return "Stigende km" else return "Feil: Ukjent retning ["..dir.."]",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Retning

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (Sight == 0) then return "(ikke angitt)" else return Sight end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Siktkrav [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data: local dirIsUp = (dir == "up") local dirIsDown = (dir = "down") -- if (dirIsUp and RightSided) then return "Høyre" elseif (dirIsUp and LeftSided) then return "Venstre" elseif (dirIsDown and RightSided) then return "Venstre" elseif (dirIsDown and LeftSided) then return "Høyre" else return "Feil: Ukjent dir ["..dir.."]" end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Side av spor i kjøre- retningen

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "-" else return math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius+0.5) end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Kurveradius [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "Rettspor" elseif (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CCW") then return "Venstrekurve" elseif (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CW") then return "Høyrekurve" else return "Feil i kurverotasjon ["..tostring(getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation).."]",_warning end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Høyre / venstre kurve (Oslo i ryggen)

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return "Rettspor" else if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CCW") then if (LeftSided) then return "Innerkurve" else return "Ytterkurve" end else if (RightSided) then return "Innerkurve" else return "Ytterkurve" end end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Innerkurve / ytterkurve

ColumnSpecification.Data: if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return 0 else r = getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CW") then --clockwise if (RightSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) end else --counterclockwise if (LeftSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) end end return math.floor(k+0.5) end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Kurveutslag Ki / Ky [mm]

ColumnSpecification.Data: oh = math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().Cant + 0.5) if (RC__isNan(oh)) then return "(mangler overhøyde)" else return oh end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Overhøyde [mm]

ColumnSpecification.Data: oh35 = math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().Cant * (3500/1500) + 0.5) if (RC__isNan(oh35)) then return "(ukjent overhøyde)" else return oh35 end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Overhøyde- utslag i 3.5m høyde [mm]

ColumnSpecification.Data: local k,s,r if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return 0 else oh35 = math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().Cant * (3500/1500) + 0.5) r = getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CW") then --clockwise if (RightSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) s = 1.0 else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) s = -1.0 end else --counterclockwise if (LeftSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) s = 1.0 else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) s = -1.0 end end if (RC__isNan(oh35)) then return "(mangler overhøyde)" else return math.floor(k + s*oh35 + .5) end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Utslag mot signalet i 3.5m høyde [mm]

ColumnSpecification.Data: local k,s,r if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveType == "Straight") then return math.abs(DistanceToAlignment) else oh35 = math.floor(getAlignmentInfo().Cant * (3500/1500) + 0.5) r = getAlignmentInfo().CurveRadius if (getAlignmentInfo().CurveRotation:upper() == "CW") then --clockwise if (RightSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) s = 1 else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) s = -1 end else --counterclockwise if (LeftSided) then --Innerkurve k = 81000/(2*r) s = 1 else --Ytterkurve k = 63000/(2*r) s = -1 end end if (RC__isNan(oh35)) then return "(mangler overhøyde)" else return math.abs(math.floor(100*(DistanceToAlignment + (k + s*oh35)/1000) + 0.5)/100) end end
ColumnSpecification.Title: Margin til stikningspunkt [m]

ColumnSpecification.Data: local s = "" local first = true if (MainSignal ~= "-") then s = MainSignal first = false end if (DistantSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Fs" else s = s.."-Fs" end first = false end if (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Ds" else s = s.."-Ds" end first = false end if (PositionLamp ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "MKs" else s = s.."-MKs" end first = false end if (CautiousDrivingSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "FKs" else s = s.."-FKs" end first = false end if (LineSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Ls" else s = s.."-Ls" end first = false end if (OpticalSpeedSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Hast" else s = s.."-Hast" end first = false end if (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then if (first) then s = "Z" else s = s.."-Z" end first = false end return s
ColumnSpecification.Title: Bestykning

Variant.Name: ETCS balise kodetabell for Østre linje
ETCS balise kodetabell for Nasjonal Implementering
